title: 03/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Tom Brady’s response on Twitter to seeing UFO’s and aliens and what this tells us about where Brady is at in his NFL career right now. He lays out why Russell Wilson should be interested in leaving Seattle for the Chicago Bears. Cardinals general manager Steve Keim joins the show to talk about signing JJ Watt. Plus, Colin talks to world renown astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson about the probability of finding other intelligent life and UFO sightings.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
